scripts.deploy: composer install && npm run version && npm run svg-sprite
scripts.update: git pull && npm run build && npm run version && npm run svg-sprite
scripts.svg-sprite: svg-symbol-sprite -i $npm_package_config_dir/assets/svg/icons -o $npm_package_config_dir/assets/svg/sprites/icons.svg --config svgo.config.js --style false && svg-symbol-sprite -i $npm_package_config_dir/assets/svg/social -o $npm_package_config_dir/assets/svg/sprites/social.svg --config svgo.config.js --style false
